Well, this is tamer than most of Jin's works but what now?, MTSP cucks...Persona-users have palace?, hypnosis element in metaverse?, that just bullsh*t! What a lazy writing. Then again, this is a doujin and NTR genre at that. It would naturally be absurd for the sake of getting in somegirl's skirt. Personally, It's not for me but get me a few giggles anyway.
@moon261 Lore inaccuracies are a boner killer, yo :(
@Iexpectedbetter You better kill yourself first then hypocuck :)
Out of all things you can comment on a hentai manga it's the inaccuracy of the subject? get the fuck out of here.

Nice idea, but there are a few things wrong though. 

Firstly, Pereona users can't have palaces. Palaces stem from a Shadow's distorted desires and Personas are shadows that have been conquered or accepted by it's owner through strength of heart. And second, even if the protag did have a palace he wouldn't be able to change the girls hearts or otherwise affect them in any way, anyway. Those are just the cognitive visions of those people made by the palaces owner.

But hey, porn is porn and Jin makes some real hot NTR so whatevs. It's interesting Jin actually gave his lecherous protagonist his comeuppance at the end, but thats probably a set up for a second book.
Pfft NTR is nothing to me. *sees Futaba & Makoto* I'LL KIILL THIS AUTHOR !
